categorySelect.contributingToExercises:
**Functional Purpose**: Option label for a contribution category
**UI Location**: Contribution category selection dropdown
**When Users See This**: When selecting a category for contributions
**Technical Context**: Part of a switch statement for different category IDs
**Current English**: "Contributing to Exercises"
categorySelect.buildingExercism:
**Functional Purpose**: Option label for a contribution category
**UI Location**: Contribution category selection dropdown
**When Users See This**: When selecting a category for contributions
**Technical Context**: Part of a switch statement for different category IDs
**Current English**: "Building Exercism"

categorySelect.anyCategory:
**Functional Purpose**: Option label for selecting all contribution categories
**UI Location**: Contribution category selection dropdown
**When Users See This**: When selecting to view contributions from any category
**Technical Context**: Part of a switch statement for different category IDs, specifically the `undefined` case for 'Any category'
**Current English**: "Any category"
categorySelect.category:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the contribution category filter
**UI Location**: Contribution list filtering options
**When Users See This**: When viewing the contribution list and needing to filter by category
**Technical Context**: Used as the `SelectedComponent` label in a `SingleSelect` component
**Current English**: "Category"
